education.institution: EMSI (École Marocaine des Sciences de l'Ingénieur)
education.description: Comprehensive engineering program in Computer Engineering (MIAGE - Méthodes Informatiques Appliquées à la Gestion). Focused on software development, database management, information systems, and project management. Strong emphasis on machine learning, deep learning, data processing, and AI model design.
achievements: Specialized in software development and data science
Expertise in designing technology solutions for business needs
Strong knowledge in machine learning and deep learning
Experience in AI applications for decision-making and automation
